import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import moment from "moment" const Question = ({ question }) => { const { t } = useTranslation(); return (

{question.upvote.length - question.downvote.length}

votes

{question.noofanswers}

answers

{question.questiontitle.length > (window.innerWidth <= 400 ? 70 : 90) ? question.questiontitle.substring( 0, window.innerWidth <= 400 ? 70 : 90 ) + "..." : question.questiontitle }
{question.questiontags.map((tag)=>(

{tag}

))}

asked {moment(question.askedon).fromNow()} {question.userposted}

) } export default Question
